org.opentosca.toscana.api

Class CsarController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentosca.toscana.api.CsarController

  • @CrossOrigin
 @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/csars")
public class CsarController
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller implements all Csar and Transformation specific operations

    For sample Responses of the Requests, please have a look at docs/api/api_samples.md

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CsarController(CsarService csarService)

    • Method Detail

      • listCSARs

        @RequestMapping(path="",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/hal+json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.Resources<CsarResponse>> listCSARs()
        Responds with a list of csars stored on the transformer.

        This always responds with HTTP-Code 200 (application/hal+json)

      • getCSARInfo

        @RequestMapping(path="/{name}",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/hal+json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CsarResponse> getCSARInfo(@PathVariable(name="name")
                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String name)
        Responds with the data for a specific CSAR

        HTTP

        200 (application/hal+json): if a archive with the given name exists if not 404 (application/hal+json): with a standard error message is returned (see samples.md for a example)

      • uploadCSAR

        @RequestMapping(path="/{name}",
                method={PUT,POST},
                produces="application/hal+json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> uploadCSAR(@PathVariable(name="name")
                                                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(name="file",required=true)
                                                                                                                                                                                              org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
        This Request (Supporting Post and Put methods) uploads a csar to the transformer.

        HTTP Response Codes

        200 (no Content): Upload succeeded

        500: Processing failed

      • deleteCsar

        @RequestMapping(path="/{name}/delete",
                method=DELETE,
                produces="application/hal+json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> deleteCsar(@PathVariable(value="name")
                                                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String name)

      • getLogs

        @RequestMapping(path="/{name}/logs",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/hal+json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<LogResponse> getLogs(@PathVariable(name="name")
                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String csarId,
                                                                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(name="start",required=false,defaultValue="0")
                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Long start)
        Returns the logs from a given start index to the current end of the logger file. If the start index is higher then the current end index, a empty list is returned! The start parameter is a URL encoded parameter (?start=0)

        Accessed with http call GET /csars/{csar}/transformations/{platform}/logs

        HTTP-Code Mime-Type Description (Returned if)
        200 application/hal+json Returns a Json object containing the desired part of the logger for the transformation
        404 application/json Returns a error message if the csar is not found or if the csar does not have a transformation for the given name (see returned error message for details)
